verses.verse: The <S%H410>famine<s%> <S%H7706>was<s%> <S%H5414>severe<s%> in <S%H7356>the<s%> <S%H6440>land.<s%>

It <S%H3615>happened,<s%> when they had eaten up the <S%H7668>grain<s%> which they had brought <S%H935>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7725>them,<s%> "Go again, <S%H7666>buy<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> more <S%H400>food.<s%>"

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5749>solemnly<s%> <S%H5749>warned<s%> <S%H559>us,<s%> saying, <S%H7200><s%> 'You shall not see my <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H1115>unless<s%> your brother is with <S%H251>you.<s%>'
If <S%H3426>you<s%>'ll <S%H7971>send<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> with <S%H3381>us,<s%> we'll go down and <S%H7666>buy<s%> you <S%H400>food,<s%>

but if <S%H7971>you<s%>'ll not send <S%H3381>him,<s%> we'll not go down, for the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>us,<s%> 'You shall not see my <S%H6440>face,<s%> unless your brother is with <S%H251>you.<s%>'"
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why did you treat me so <S%H7489>badly,<s%> <S%H5046>telling<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that you had another <S%H251>brother?<s%>"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H7592>directly<s%> concerning <S%H4138>ourselves,<s%> and concerning our relatives, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1><s%> 'Is your father still <S%H2416>alive?<s%> Have <S%H3426>you<s%> another <S%H251>brother?<s%>' We <S%H5046>just<s%> <S%H5921>answered<s%> <S%H6310>his<s%> <S%H1697>questions.<s%> Is there any way we <S%H3045>could<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that he would <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3381><s%> 'Bring your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3381>down?<s%>'"

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H7971>"Send<s%> the <S%H5288>boy<s%> with <S%H6965>me,<s%> and we'll get up and <S%H3212>go,<s%> so that we may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and not <S%H4191>die,<s%> both <S%H2945>we,<s%> and you, and also our little ones.

<S%H6148>I<s%>'ll be collateral for <S%H3027>him.<s%> From my hand will you <S%H1245>require<s%> <S%H518>him.<s%> If I <S%H518>don't<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H6440>you,<s%> and <S%H3322>set<s%> him before <S%H6440>you,<s%> then let me bear the blame <S%H2398>forever,<s%>
for if we <S%H3884>hadn't<s%> <S%H4102>delayed,<s%> surely we would have <S%H7725>returned<s%> a second time by <S%H6471>now.<s%>"

Their <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H645>them,<s%> "If it must be so, then <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3947>this.<s%> Take from the choice <S%H2173>fruits<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> in your <S%H3627>bags,<s%> and carry <S%H3381>down<s%> a <S%H4503>present<s%> for the <S%H376>man,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H6875>balm,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H5219>spices<s%> and <S%H3910>myrrh,<s%> <S%H992>nuts,<s%> and <S%H8247>almonds;<s%>

and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H7725>take<s%> <S%H3027>back<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H7725>returned<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H572>sacks.<s%> Perhaps it was an <S%H4870>oversight.<s%>
<S%H3947>Take<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6965>also,<s%> get up, and <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H376>man.<s%>

May <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7356>mercy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H376>man,<s%> that he may <S%H7971>release<s%> to you your <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%> <S%H834>If<s%> I am <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> of my <S%H7921>children,<s%> I am bereaved."

The <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2063>that<s%> <S%H4503>present,<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%> and got <S%H6965>up,<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

When <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> he said to the steward of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H935>"Bring<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H2873>butcher<s%> an <S%H3559>animal,<s%> and prepare; for the <S%H582>men<s%> will <S%H398>dine<s%> with me at <S%H6672>noon.<s%>"
The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>commanded,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

The <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> because they were <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1697>"Because<s%> of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H7725>returned<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks<s%> at the first <S%H8462>time,<s%> <S%H935>we<s%>'re brought in; that he may seek <S%H1556>occasion<s%> against <S%H5307>us,<s%> attack <S%H3947>us,<s%> and seize us as <S%H5650>slaves,<s%> along with our <S%H2543>donkeys.<s%>"
They came <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H376>steward<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%>
and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>"Oh,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> we <S%H3381>indeed<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> the first <S%H8462>time<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%>

When we <S%H935>came<s%> to the lodging <S%H4411>place,<s%> we <S%H6605>opened<s%> our <S%H572>sacks,<s%> and <S%H376>behold,<s%> each man's <S%H3701>money<s%> was in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of his <S%H572>sack,<s%> our <S%H3701>money<s%> in full <S%H4948>weight.<s%> We have brought it <S%H7725>back<s%> in our <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

We have brought <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in our <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%> We <S%H3045>don't<s%> know who <S%H7760>put<s%> our <S%H3701>money<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>"Peace<s%> be to <S%H3372>you.<s%> Don't be afraid. Your <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H4301>treasure<s%> in your <S%H572>sacks.<s%> I <S%H935>received<s%> your <S%H3701>money.<s%>" He <S%H3318>brought<s%> Simeon out to <S%H8095>them.<s%>

The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> into <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4325>water,<s%> and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet.<s%> He <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> <S%H4554>fodder.<s%>

They <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H935>coming<s%> at <S%H6672>noon,<s%> for they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they should <S%H398>eat<s%> bread <S%H3899>there.<s%>

When <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>home,<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> him the <S%H4503>present<s%> which was in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> themselves down to him to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

He <S%H7592>asked<s%> them of their <S%H7965>welfare,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7965>well,<s%> the old <S%H2205>man<s%> of whom you <S%H559>spoke?<s%> Is he yet <S%H2416>alive?<s%>"
They <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> our <S%H1>father,<s%> is <S%H7965>well.<s%> He is still <S%H2416>alive.<s%>" They <S%H6915>bowed<s%> down <S%H7812>humbly.<s%>

He lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is this your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> of whom you <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>me?<s%>" He said, <S%H430>"God<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to <S%H1121>you,<s%> my son."

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4116>hurried,<s%> for his <S%H7356>heart<s%> <S%H3648>yearned<s%> over his <S%H251>brother;<s%> and he <S%H1245>sought<s%> a place to <S%H1058>weep.<s%> He <S%H935>entered<s%> into his <S%H2315>room,<s%> and wept <S%H1058>there.<s%>
He <S%H7364>washed<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and came <S%H3318>out.<s%> He <S%H662>controlled<s%> <S%H559>himself,<s%> and said, "Serve <S%H7760>the<s%> <S%H3899>meal.<s%>"

They <S%H7760>served<s%> him by <S%H4713>himself,<s%> and them by themselves, and the Egyptians, that <S%H398>ate<s%> with <S%H4713>him,<s%> by themselves, because the Egyptians <S%H3201>don't<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> for that is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

They <S%H3427>sat<s%> before <S%H6440>him,<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> according to his <S%H1062>birthright,<s%> and the <S%H6810>youngest<s%> according to his <S%H6812>youth,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H8539>marveled<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H7453>another.<s%>

He <S%H5375>sent<s%> <S%H4864>portions<s%> to them from before <S%H6440>him,<s%> but <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>'s <S%H4864>portion<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3027>times<s%> as much <S%H7235>as<s%> any of <S%H8354>theirs.<s%> They drank, and were merry with <S%H7937>him.<s%>
